TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: Ah, this is my home... it was. Even my toys are still here... See? Even in childhood I had this feeling about the <color=orange>Eye</color>.
SOLANUM: It has literally no reason to waiting for us, but my dad and others was blinded by the knowledge lust.
SOLANUM: Whole city, elders and kids, all are turned to ashes... It's very hard to handle. Knowing I'm the last alive Nomai don't makes me feel better.
SOLANUM: At least now I can say "goodbye" to them... and... pleaase stay back. I need to turn something more to ash...
